content:
Hello! I’m an AI Researcher at the German Research Center for Artificial Intelligence (DFKI). My work primarily revolves around machine learning (ML) and its diverse applications. I have extensive experience in computer vision and time series modeling, particularly using satellite imagery and other remote sensing data. Recently, I’ve been exploring the privacy and security challenges of ML models, contributing to advancements in Trustworthy Machine Learning.
I hold an M.Sc. in Cognitive Science from Osnabrück University, where I specialized in AI and Neuroinformatics. Since 2021, I’ve been working in the AI domain, honing my expertise in machine learning, computer vision, and remote sensing. I’m deeply passionate about tackling complex challenges and building innovative, practical solutions.
Before pursuing my M.Sc., I earned a B.Tech in Electronics Engineering from HBTI Kanpur. I began my professional journey as an Application Developer at IBM, where I developed backend web services using Java and created PL/SQL scripts for database triggers, functions, and procedures in Oracle DB.
Contact You can reach me via email at deepak_kumar.pathak@dfki.de or connect with me on LinkedIn.
Timeline AI Researcher, Mission KI, DFKI Oct, 2024 - Current Kaiserslautern, Germany AI Researcher, Yield Consortium, DFKI Oct, 2021 - Oct, 2024 Kaiserslautern, Germany M.Sc., Cognitive Science April, 2019 - Aug, 2021 Osnabrück, Germany Application Developer, IBM Aug, 2015 - Mar, 2019 Bengaluru, India B.Tech, Electronics Engineering Aug, 2011 - June, 2015 Kanpur, India
summary: Hello! I’m an AI Researcher at the German Research Center for Artificial Intelligence (DFKI).
title: About
